attributes.action: Submit a motion "That this House has no confidence in Her Majesty's Government"
attributes.background:
We call for MPs to bring a motion before the House of Commons "That this House has no confidence in Her Majesty's Government".

It has become quite clear that Theresa May will not deliver Brexit in any reasonable sense of the term, will not listen to MPs and will not listen to the British people.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
